description: Turmeric Cauliflower Rice, Spiced Chickpeas or lentils, Black pepper hummus and Greens bowl. Amazing Flavors for any meal. Ready within 25 minutes. Vegan Gluten-free Grain-free Soy-free Recipe
name: Chickpeas Turmeric Cauliflower Rice Black Pepper Hummus Bowl
recipeIngredient: 1 small head of cauliflower (chopped into florets)
a generous dash of lemon or lime juice
15 oz can chickpeas (drained or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas or use lentils)
salt to taste (depends on if the chickpeas are salted)
1/2 tsp or more freshly ground or crushed black pepper (divided)

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the cauliflower or process in a food processor for a few seconds. I use a food processor.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent.
Add turmeric and mix in for a few seconds.

Add the riced cauliflower, salt and cayenne and mix in. Cover and cook for 4 to 6 minutes. The cauliflower will steam and cook through. Add a good dash of lemon and fluff the mixture. Taste and adjust salt, lemon, heat. Cover and let sit for another minute or so before serving.

This quick Turmeric Cauliflower rice gets paired with spiced chickpeas and carrots. A dollop of hummus that has amazing flavor from freshly crushed black pepper and a bowlful of greens of choice. Make the entire bowl or parts of it. Just the chickpeas and Turmeric Cauliflower rice with a dash of lemon is delicious as well. Thin out a portion of the hummus to use as dressing if needed.  

Cauliflower Rice is delicious simply spiced with turmeric and lemon. Black pepper boosts turmericâ€™s absorption and the flavor profile added to the hummus is amazing. Make hummus from scratch or use store bough or premade. With premade hummus the meal comes together within 25 minutes.
